abstract: On the campaign trail, Mitt Romney has talked about the need for a strong America, and it is a theme he said he would address in his speech on Friday in Charleston, S.C.
snippet: On the campaign trail, Mitt Romney has talked about the need for a strong America, and it is a theme he said he would address in his speech on Friday in Charleston, S.C.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney will deliver a foreign policy speech on Friday in Charleston, S.C., he announced Monday afternoon on Sean Hannity's radio show.
